title: How Your Brain Processes Visual Information
description: Mind-blowing facts about how the human brain processes visual data faster than text

dialogue.text: Did you know that the human brain processes visual information sixty thousand times faster than text?
No way! That's incredible! So that's why videos are so much more engaging than reading?
Exactly! That's why platforms like TikTok and YouTube are so addictive. Your brain is literally wired to consume visual content faster.
Mind blown! So when I'm scrolling through social media, my brain is processing all those images and videos at lightning speed?
